name: Panther Protocol
intro: Enabling privacy and trust in DeFi
introduce: Panther Protocol is an end-to-end solution that restores privacy in Web3 and DeFi while providing financial institutions with a clear path to compliantly participate in decentralized finance. Panther provides DeFi users with fully collateralized privacy-enhancing digital assets, leveraging crypto-economic incentives and zkSNARK technology. Users can mint zero-knowledge zAssets by depositing digital assets from any blockchain into Panther vaults.
